hints.content:
The first set of blocks shows $\purpleD3$ tens and $\purpleD4$ ones so, our first addend is $\purpleD{34}$.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/be3d74f94dce9ec5a7f6137c0a3937c5a911a6ac)

Our second set of blocks shows $\maroonD2$ tens and $\maroonD9$ ones so, our second addend is $\maroonD{29}$.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/16697b08767c525f27528150932067743604d7be)

Our sum shows $6$ tens and $3$ ones, or $63$.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/5a89ab8528633aaa20928fb52bf3666f733aa2c1)

This equation represents the place value blocks:

$\purpleD{34} + \maroonD{29} =63$

question.content:
**Which equation can be represented from the place value blocks below?**

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/f77ec545daebd5f4188277150143743d44bc07a5)

[[☃ radio 1]]
